skills.successful: Elyse: What's the matter, hun? Never looked a lady in her eye before?
skills.unsuccessful: Elyse: You're about as sharp as a cactus, I mean a cactus with no spikes.

skills.successful: Elyse: You aint heard o' me? I go by The Kid, my Posse will be here soon, an' all 12 know their way round a rifle.
skills.unsuccessful: You best walk away, my Posse will be here soon, 500 strong, all killers.

skills.successful: Elyse manages to look super cool and super intimidating at the same time
skills.unsuccessful: Elyse tries her best to squint in a cowboy-like fashion, but a bead of sweat rolls right into her eye and she ends up looking more consternated' than intimidatin'.

responses.successful: Elyse: How dare you bring up my mother!
responses.unsuccessful: Elyse: That's a bit misogynistic don't you think?

responses.successful: Elyse: Gee you sound pretty violent mister (momma did say certain gunslingers you gotta watch out for).
Elyse is shaking in her boots!!!
responses.unsuccessful: Elyse: You couldn't scare the candy out of a baby.

skills.successful: Cowardly Cowboy: I'll leave you dead like your rodehard mother.
skills.unsuccessful: Cowardly Cowboy: You're more suited for a pair of knitting needles than a pistol little girl.

skills.successful: Cowardly Cowboy: I kilt girls like you before, it was easier than swatting a fly.
skills.unsuccessful: You better watch out bitch... I uh know the Sheriff.

skills.successful: Cowardly Cowboy musters all his courage and stares you deep in the eyes.
skills.unsuccessful: Cowardly Cowboy looks like he's going to crap himself.

responses.successful: Cowardly Cowboy: You're not very nice, are you.
Cowardly Cowboy: Aw jeez The Kid??? I never met a gunslinger with a real-life nickname. You sound p-p-pretty tough.
responses.unsuccessful: Cowardly Cowboy: Nice try, sister, it takes a liar to know one and no one is better at spinning a yarn than me!

responses.successful: Cowardly Cowboy is shaking in his boots!!!
responses.unsuccessful: Cowardly Cowboy: I think you got something in your eye lil girl

skills.successful: Sheriff: You're more gutless then a skinned pig
skills.unsuccessful: Cowardly Cowboy: Not as sharp as I used to be no insults are coming to mind

skills.successful: Cowardly Cowboy: Not the first time I've gunned down a pip squeak like you, wont be the last.
skills.unsuccessful: You better watch out bitch... I uh know the Sheriff.

skills.successful: Cowardly Cowboy lights a cigar and stares at you as if he is bored by the whole affair.
skills.unsuccessful: Cowardly Cowboy old lungs give out as he inhales and hacks his lungs up in an embarrassing fashion

responses.successful: Sheriff: You best watch that tongue of yours cur, liable to make a man draw his iron.
Even the biggest idiot is dangerous with a posse at their back
responses.unsuccessful: I've plaid my fair share o poker and you madam are full of shit

responses.successful: Cowardly Cowboy is shaking in his boots!!!
responses.unsuccessful: Cowardly Cowboy: Hard to shoot if you cant your eyes open
